questionnaire.title: Flow-Short-Scale (Run)
questionnaire.description:
Below you will find some statements that should you relate to the recently finished run. Please remind you back to the run. To what extent do the following statements apply for you?
The crucial factor is your personal opinion; there are no right or wrong answers. You have the following answer possibilities:

Give by clicking, in which extend each statement apply or not apply to your personal assessment of your experience during the run. Further left you are selecting, the less the statement applies for you. Conversely, a statement applies more for you, the further right you are selecting.

questions.question: I feel just the right amount of challenge.
My thoughts/activities run fluidly and smoothly.
I am totally absorbed in what I am doing.
The right thoughts/movements occur of their own accord.
I know what I have to do each step of the way.
I feel that I have everything under control.
I am completely lost in thought.
Something important to me is at stake here.
I won’t make any mistake here.
Compared to all other activities which I partake in, this one is ...
I think that my competence in this area is ...
For me personally, the current demands are ...
